data.comment: The match is underway in Parma.
Throw-in for Spezia at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 2, Emmanuel Gyasi for Spezia drives towards goal at Ennio Tardini. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Parma Calcio's Giuseppe Pezzella gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Spezia defender.
Gervinho for Parma Calcio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Spezia at Ennio Tardini.
Free kick for Spezia in the half of Parma Calcio.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Parma Calcio.
In the minute 5, Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Alberto Grassi is booked for the home team.
In Parma a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Valerio Marini signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Spezia's half.
In the minute 6, Tommaso Pobega (Spezia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 7, M'bala Nzola (Spezia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Spezia pushes forward through Emmanuel Gyasi, whose finish on goal is saved.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 9, Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Valerio Marini.
Parma Calcio are pushing forward but Andreas Cornelius's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Parma.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Parma Calcio.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
Parma Calcio needs to be cautious. Spezia have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Parma Calcio.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Parma Calcio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
In the minute 14, Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Giuseppe Pezzella of Parma Calcio gets in a strike, but is off target.
Valerio Marini awards Spezia a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Free kick Parma Calcio.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Spezia.
Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Parma Calcio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Valerio Marini.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Parma Calcio close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 23, Hernani (Parma Calcio) has received a first yellow card.
Valerio Marini signals a throw-in for Spezia, close to Parma Calcio's area.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Valerio Marini.
In the minute 28, Julian Chabot scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Simone Bastoni to set up the goal.
Spezia take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Kevin Agudelo.
In the minute 31, M'bala Nzola with an assist there.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Valerio Marini signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Spezia's half.
In the minute 33, Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Parma Calcio.
Goal! Riccardo Gagliolo pulls one back for Parma Calcio to make it 1-2.
Valerio Marini awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Parma a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Spezia.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
In the minute 41, Free kick Spezia.
Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
Spezia's Simone Bastoni gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 42, Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Parma Calcio's Gaston Brugman breaks free at Ennio Tardini. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Can Parma Calcio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
Valerio Marini awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Valerio Marini signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Spezia's half.
Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Spezia.
Valerio Marini awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Parma.
In the minute 53, The home team replace Hernani with Yann Karamoh.
Wylan Cyprien is on a sub for Gaston Brugman for Parma Calcio.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Spezia at Ennio Tardini.
Nahuel Estevez is replacing Tommaso Pobega for Spezia at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Vincenzo Italiano is making the team's second substitution at Ennio Tardini with Salva Ferrer replacing Jacopo Sala.
In Parma Spezia attack through Nahuel Estevez. The finish is off target, however.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Valerio Marini.
In the minute 57, Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Valerio Marini.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Valerio Marini.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
In the minute 59, Parma Calcio have a dangerous throw-in.
Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 62, Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Valerio Marini.
Parma Calcio's Riccardo Gagliolo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Spezia at Ennio Tardini.
Can Parma Calcio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spezia's half?
In the minute 63, Daniele Verde is replacing Kevin Agudelo for the away team.
Spezia make their fourth substitution with Cristian Dell`Orco replacing Simone Bastoni.
In the minute 64, At Ennio Tardini, Spezia are penalized for being offside.
Parma Calcio's Juraj Kucka is whistled for offside at Ennio Tardini.
Valerio Marini signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Spezia's half.
In the minute 66, Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
In Parma, Riccardo Gagliolo (Parma Calcio) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 67, Spezia have a goal kick.
In Parma Spezia attack through Cristian Dell`Orco. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
In the minute 69, Lucien Agoume hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Parma for Spezia.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
In the minute 71, Valerio Marini awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Parma Calcio push upfield and Andreas Cornelius gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Spezia defence.
In the minute 72, Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yann Karamoh of Parma Calcio is pulled up for offside.
Spezia's Daniele Verde gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the home team in Parma.
Throw-in high up the field for Spezia in Parma.
Spezia's Daniele Verde breaks free at Ennio Tardini. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
Spezia's Daniele Verde fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Simon Sohm is replacing Jasmin Kurtic for the home team.
Spezia drives forward and Nahuel Estevez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Parma Calcio's Yann Karamoh is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 81, Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Valerio Marini.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Spezia make their fifth substitution with Roberto Piccoli replacing M'bala Nzola.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Spezia.
Yann Karamoh of Parma Calcio smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Parma Calcio's Alberto Grassi is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Parma Calcio just outside Spezia's area.
Salva Ferrer for Spezia has been booked by Valerio Marini and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 86, Wylan Cyprien for Parma Calcio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Valerio Marini awards Spezia a goal kick.
Parma Calcio's Juraj Kucka breaks free at Ennio Tardini. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Spezia at Ennio Tardini.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spezia have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Parma Calcio.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
An attacking Parma Calcio player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Parma Calcio.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
That's full-time at Ennio Tardini. The final score is 2-2.
Simon Sohm (Parma Calcio) gets a yellow card.
Juraj Kucka levels the score at 2-2 from the penalty spot.
